citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
Pest Control. Two rats were observed in the food storage shed. Housing facilities and food storage areas must have an
effective program to the control pests to prevent contamination and health risks to the nonhuman primates. Licensee must
establish and maintain an effective program to control rodents. Correct by April 30, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.84(d) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
Pest Control. Two rats were observed in the food storage shed. Housing facilities and food storage areas must have an 
effective program to the control pests to prevent contamination and health risks to the nonhuman primates. Licensee must 
establish and maintain an effective program to control rodents. Correct by April 30, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
